sentences.en: a permanent change in your eating habits
sentences.cn: 饮食习惯的永久改变

sentences.en: A permanent cure will only be effected by acupuncture, chiropractic or manipulation.
sentences.cn: 只有针灸、脊椎指压治疗或者推拿术才能实现彻底治愈。

sentences.en: Divorce is a permanent, ineradicable fact of modern life.
sentences.cn: 离婚在现代生活中一直存在、无法改变。

sentences.en: Don't get me wrong, it's interesting work. But it's not permanent.
sentences.cn: 别误会我的意思，这个工作很有意思，可惜不是长期性的。

sentences.en: He gave up a permanent job in order to freelance.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了固定工作，为的是当一名自由职业者。

sentences.en: Miller soon became a permanent fixture (= someone or something that is always there ) on the team.
sentences.cn: 米勒很快就成为球队的固定队员。

sentences.en: She has been granted permanent residency in Britain.
sentences.cn: 她获准在英国永久居住。

sentences.en: She is tall and blonde, with a permanent tan.
sentences.cn: 她高个儿，一头金发，皮肤黝黑。

sentences.en: Strange shadows moved silently in the almost permanent darkness.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的黑影在几乎浓得化不开的黑暗里悄无声息地移动。

sentences.en: The arrangement was put on a permanent footing earlier this year.
sentences.cn: 今年年初就确定了这一安排是长期性的.

sentences.en: The blindness that the disease causes will be permanent.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病引起的失明是永久性的。

sentences.en: The experience left a lasting impression on him.
sentences.cn: 这一经历给他留下了不可磨灭的印象。

sentences.en: The museum will have a permanent exhibition of 60 vintage cars.
sentences.cn: 这个博物馆将长期展出60辆老爷车。

sentences.en: The photos will be a permanent memento of your wedding.
sentences.cn: 这些照片会成为你婚礼的永久纪念.

sentences.en: There was a permanent 20-yard queue for the portable toilets.
sentences.cn: 流动厕所前总排着20码长的队伍。

sentences.en: They are now living together on a permanent basis.
sentences.cn: 他们现在决定长期同住。

sentences.en: They feel under permanent threat.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得一直处于威胁之下。

sentences.en: They had entered the country and had applied for permanent residence.
sentences.cn: 他们已经入境该国，并申请了永久居留权。

sentences.en: With permanent tints, the result won't wash out.
sentences.cn: 用的是永久性的涂料，洗不掉。

sentences.en: Work began on establishing the cemeteries as permanent memorials to the fallen.
sentences.cn: 把公墓建成阵亡战士的永久性纪念碑的工作已经开始。
